amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for the Department of Homeland Security Office of Civil Rights and Liberties by $3 million and to reduce funds for Security, Enforcement, and Investigations Automation Modernization by $4.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for Departmental Operations Office of the Secretary and Executive Management by $3 million and reduce funds for Security, Enforcement, and Investigations Automation Modernization by $4,800,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 260 (Roll no. 345).
